Title: Promotes efficient and effective oversight of continuing care retirement communities; repealer
Summary: Promotes efficient and effective oversight of continuing care retirement communities; transfers certain powers and duties from the continuing care retirement community council to the commissioner of health; repeals certain provisions of law relating thereto.
LawCode: Rpld ยง4603, amd Pub Health L, generally; amd ยง1119, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to promoting efficient and effective oversight of continuing care retirement communities; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
